title: Nousatsu Maid In Scissors -Echi Echi Kyun-
alternative_title: Leg-Locking Hunky Maids -Sexy Heartthrobs- ; 悩殺メイドINシザース～えちえちキュン～ ; 뇌쇄 메이드 IN 시저스 -에로에로 큥-
status: Leg-Locking Hunky Maids -Sexy Heartthrobs- ; 悩殺メイドINシザース～えちえちキュン～ ; 뇌쇄 메이드 IN 시저스 -에로에로 큥-
description:
Description :
        Former college wrestler Kiyohiko has a successful career at a prestigious company. His younger brother, Fumihiko, on the other hand, helps out with the family business, delivering goods and doing menial tasks. One day, Kiyohiko delivers an item that Fumihiko forgot to take with him to the very shop etched with a naughty memory from his college days...!Much to his surprise, Kiyohiko finds his younger brother working at the caf there, in a maid costume! On top of that, he runs into his former wrestling teammate Arahata, the very guy he shared his dirty little secret with in college...!Hunky guys in maid costumes fall in love in this chaotic and thrilling romance!
